dependencies.package: mobilesubstrate, firmware(>=10.0), preferenceloader, cy+cpu.arm64, ru.rejail.libgraphite(>=2.2), firmware(<=12.0)

descriptionlist.description: The tweak will allow you to turn off the lock password under certain conditions to choose from: when airplane mode is on, when charging, when playing music, at a given time and when connected to a specific WiFi network..
